description:
At Babnik Law in Coral Gables, Florida, estate planning is one of our primary practice areas. We therefore stand ready, willing and able to help you with everything from a simple will to the most complex trusts. We can also help you when you face probate issues or estate litigation.

The attorneys in our law firm realize, however, that as important as estate planning is, this is not the only area in which our clients may need legal help. Consequently, we also provide superior legal services in the following areas:

  • Family law: divorce, child custody, support and visitation, spousal support, marital property division
  • Parental rights
  • Prenuptial and postnuptial agreements
  • Guardianships
  • Real estate law: deed preparation, contract review

In other words, our motto says it all: "Experience you can trust." What we mean by this is that Andrew Babnik Jr., our law firm's founding partner, is licensed to practice not only in Florida, but also in Michigan, New Jersey and New York. He and our team of attorneys have years of experience helping clients who face complicated multistate legal issues.

Babnik Law is all about client service. We offer free initial consultations and virtual appointments. We also accept all major credit cards.
